thread.title: JCL from Asheville
thread.title_full: FlightHub reviewed by JCL from Asheville

author: JCL from Asheville
title: JCL from Asheville
text: So glad FH had the Best Deal highlighted in the special box before all the other flights listed, as this saved us hundreds of dollars in flight costs. I kept looking past this box bc I was adamant about certain criteria I was looking for in our flights, but then with a few minor adjustments in our schedule, we were able to make it all work for a lot less money. It is gonna make our trip that much sweeter knowing we didn't get gouged on the price bc we were looking less than 6 months out for a flight! JCL from Asheville
